branchCategory.name: 11-LEFS, Electric Actuator, Slider Type, Ball Screw Drive, Step Motor/Servo Motor, Clean Room
branchCategory.description: The 11-LEFS is the clean room version of the standard LEFS. This version is only available with the inline motor. Strokes are available in 50mm increments only.
